participant_1.background:
I live with my mother in a small town in the Midwest.
i am an army ranger.
i work part time in the campus library.
My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search.
i currently am engaged to my high school boyfriend.

participant_2.background:
I try to find solace in my planning and excitement for my upcoming trip to Europe.
I have two cats, Mittens and Snowball, who are my best friends.
I am not comfortable sharing my family's reaction with you.
I am close to my family because I was raised to be close to them.
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.

content.text: Hello, I'm doing well. I'm really excited about my upcoming trip to Europe!
That sounds awesome! Where are you going?
I'm going to be visiting England, France, and Italy.
Wow, that's a lot of traveling! What are you looking forward to the most?
I'm really looking forward to seeing the history and culture of each country. I'm also excited to try the different food!
That sounds like a great trip! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
Thanks, I'm sure I will! How about you, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, spend time with my family, and work out.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to read too, but I don't get to do it as much as I'd like. I also like to play with my cats, Mittens and Snowball.
I love cats! I have a cat named Oliver.
Oh, I love that name! Cats are the best.
